text: I feel like this could have been a Robot Master's theme, maybe even the best one in this game. The main melody almost feels like it's singing, I could easily see some lyrics attached to it (not that I would prefer that... I wouldn't). It seems like Ryo Kawakami hasn't really been active since, that's unfortunate.
author: SupraDarky

text: Ya know, I was doing my best to avoid this game's ost before I finished the legacy collection but I'm glad I checked this track out. It was beautifully somber with a determination vibe.
author: Chris Molina

text: Feels like an ending credits song to me, I imagine a montage of robot master roll call and other main character pictures ; )
author: xSayPleasex

text: A really nice theme. General feeling of a victory lap for the player while encouraging you to give it one last push through all that comes your way!

text: That artwork almost makes me want to see a Netflix adaptation of this franchise. Almost...

text: Love this song, one of the best MegaMan songs imo. I've been dragging my heels on it, but I plan to start up a channel for all-saxophone arrangements of video game tunes sooner or later, and this one is fairly high on the list of tunes to cover. So good.

text: Good luck! Passion projects will always have their difficulties, but one of the toughest obstacles is getting it started!
